MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart, affecting properties in Whithorn and Castlewigg. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.10am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line close to the Castlewigg Hotel and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.55am on the 30th of November 2020.
